meanings.definition: The office or position of a stadtholder.
meanings.sent1: In the past, stadtholderships were important roles in some countries.
meanings.sent2: The stadtholderships were often held by powerful individuals.
meanings.sent3: The king jokingly offered his cat the stadtholdership of the royal mouse-catching duties.
meanings.sent4: She saw the promotion as a stadtholdership, a chance to lead and make a difference.
meanings.sent5: The stadtholdership came with great responsibility and authority.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a stadtholder.
meanings.sent1: During his stadtholdership, many reforms were implemented.
meanings.sent2: The stadtholdership lasted for five years.
meanings.sent3: The stadtholdership of the class pet rotated weekly among the students.
meanings.sent4: Her time as team captain felt like a stadtholdership, with everyone looking up to her.
meanings.sent5: The stadtholdership was marked by progress and positive changes.
